special_text:
[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When Alter Ego Class enters search your library for a creature that shares a creature type and color with a creature you control then exile it and shuffle.
{1}{U}{R}: Level 2
{2}{U}{R}: Create a token that is a copy of a creature exiled with Alter Ego Class.
{5}{U}{R}: Level 3
[i]High Servant[/i]
